gameDescription: In Operation Pollination, players commandeer advanced airships in a near future where the survival of bees and the global ecosystem is at stake. The game combines strategic decision-making with environmental conservation, focusing on the crucial role bees play in our world, as highlighted by Greater Good Charities.

blueTeam.name: The Apis Aviators
blueTeam.description: Experts in building and restoring habitats.

redTeam.name: The Bombus Navigators
redTeam.description: Specializes in bee rescue and relocation.

turns.scenario: The team navigates regions afflicted by hurricanes. Their strategy will shape the future of local bee populations.

options.A: Plant native flowers to restore bee habitats.
options.B: Establish new bee colonies in safe zones, ensuring their survival post-disaster.

AA.narrative: Both teams restore habitats and establish new colonies, creating a balanced ecosystem that encourages bee recovery.

AB.narrative: Apis Aviators focus on habitat restoration while Bombus Navigators ensure the bees' immediate survival. Their combined efforts result in long-term sustainability.

BA.narrative: Bombus Navigators restore habitats, while Apis Aviators secure the bees' survival. Both species flourish under their stewardship.

BB.narrative: Both teams focus on relocating bees, saving numerous colonies. However, untouched habitats will need attention in the future.

turns.scenario: After devastating wildfires, decisions must be made to revitalize the areas affected and ensure bee survival.

options.A: Seed the area with bee-friendly vegetation to promote ecological recovery.
options.B: Create artificial bee habitats in unaffected regions to accommodate displaced populations.

AA.narrative: Both teams seed areas to restore native vegetation, creating a blooming paradise for local bee populations.

AB.narrative: Apis Aviators sow bee-friendly vegetation while Bombus Navigators establish artificial habitats. Together they cultivate biodiversity amidst the ashes.

BA.narrative: While Bombus Navigators sow seeds, Apis Aviators set up new habitats. Diversity and bee populations bloom as a result.

BB.narrative: Both teams create artificial habitats, securing the survival of displaced bees. Immediate relief is granted, but permanent solutions are still required.

turns.scenario: A global focus has turned towards bee conservation. The teams need to decide on their crucial next steps.

options.A: Develop advanced bee sanctuaries with ecological technology.
options.B: Launch educational campaigns to raise awareness and promote conservation.

AA.narrative: Both teams build high-tech sanctuaries. Bees flourish, and science marvels at the vibrant, sustainable ecosystems created.

AB.narrative: Apis Aviators build a sanctuary while Bombus Navigators invest in education, garnering public support and ensuring the bees' future.

BA.narrative: The Bombus Navigators build the sanctuary as Apis Aviators spread awareness. Both technological innovation and public support skyrockets.

BB.narrative: Both teams prioritize education, creating a global shift in attitudes towards bees and their habitats, ensuring their future survival.
